channel.title: How do you put "here" instead of a hyperlink(I know it's not about servers)
channel.description: I want to know how to put "here" in place of a hyperlink...

item.title: How do you put "here" instead of a hyperlink(I know it's not about servers)
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

Oh, ok, ty. And this isn’t spam, it’s asking for help, and if I posted it in another section, then it’d be in the wrong one…

here

Woot!

Read full topic
item.source: How do you put "here" instead of a hyperlink(I know it's not about servers)

item.title: How do you put "here" instead of a hyperlink(I know it's not about servers)
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

When If you want to add here just make (http://Moparscape.org.smf) and finish your post and click post

Then go back to your post and click edit and you will see something like this http://Moparscape.org/smf]http://Moparscape.org/smf[/url]

After the first URL will be the ]. After that is what you want it to say just change it to here and it should look like this
here

Read full topic
item.source: How do you put "here" instead of a hyperlink(I know it's not about servers)

item.title: How do you put "here" instead of a hyperlink(I know it's not about servers)
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Perry Sir Perry
item.description:
@Sir_Perry wrote:

Yes, this is spam but I’ll be nice and answer anyway.

[url = http://examplesite.test ]Display text here[/ url]

Remember to not include the spaces.

Read full topic
